stimulusHtml: Which of the following integrals represents the area enclosed by the smaller loop of the graph of r = 1 + 2 sin θ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4200@ ?
choicesHtml: 1 2 ∫ 7 π / 6 11 π / 6 ( 1 + 2 sin θ ) 2   d θ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@52D6@
